items.name: Doryani's Invitation
explicitMods: 1% of Lightning Damage Leeched as Life
Your Flasks grant 10% chance to Shock during flask effect
flavourText: "You can invite them but you can never be
sure who will come knocking."
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

explicitMods: 21% increased Movement Speed during flask effect
Recharges 1 Charge when you deal a Critical Strike
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

explicitMods: Immunity to Curses during flask effect. Removes Curses on use
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

Shift click to unstack.

explicitMods: +1 to Level of Gems in this item
Supported Active Skill Gems gain 6% increased Experience
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants fire resistance to you and your allies.

socketedItems.secDescrText: An arc of lightning stretches from the caster to a targeted nearby enemy and chains on to additional targets.

items.name: Rainbowstride
explicitMods: 22% of Block Chance applied to Spells
flavourText: "They say that you should take life's troubles in your stride.
Some men have a longer stride than others."
- Gaius Sentari

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, making their attacks and spells less effective.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have 20% reduced Accuracy Rating
Cursed enemies have 20% reduced Critical Strike Chance
Cursed enemies have 20% reduced Critical Strike Multiplier
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 31 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Spells directly
Casts Supported Spells when you take a total of 440 Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Performs a warcry, adding endurance charges proportional to the number of surrounding enemies. Taunts all nearby enemies to attack the caster.
explicitMods: 17 Endurance Charges granted per one hundred nearby enemies
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Discharges Endurance Charges, making the character invulnerable to physical damage for a short time, proportional to how many endurance charges were expended.
explicitMods: Additional 0.70 Seconds Base Duration per Endurance Charge
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Void Battery
explicitMods: 25% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
flavourText: "The trick is to give nothingness,
and to receive everything in return."
- Inquisitor Maligaro

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, making them more vulnerable to Critical Strikes. Killing the cursed targets will grant life and mana, and a chance to gain a power charge.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have a 37% chance to grant a Power Charge when slain
Cursed enemies have an additional 9% chance to receive a Critical Strike
Cursed enemies take 34% more extra damage from Critical Strikes
Cursed enemies grant 22 Life when Killed
Cursed enemies grant 22 Mana when Killed

items.name: Atziri's Foible
explicitMods: Items and Gems have 25% reduced Attribute Requirements
flavourText: The world is but a piece of parchment, blank and symmetric.
We label each side: one Good, one Evil; one Black, one White.
The divine truth, however, is that both are one and the same.
-Jaetai, Vaal Advisor

items.name: Carcass Jack
flavourText: "...The discomfort shown by the others is amusing, but none
can deny that my work has made quite the splash..."
- Maligaro's Journal
